official.headline: Public Demos Erupt
official.anchor_line: Citizens gather peacefully as protestors display simulation footage from the 2022 Council selection process.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd’s transparent digital governance system reaffirms that open scrutiny leads to ongoing improvements and better leadership outcomes.

official.headline: Council Selection Questioned
official.anchor_line: Revelations emerge about Council member Behavioral Compliance Index (BCI) scores and selection methods.
official.contextual_reframing: The Behavioral Compliance Index (BCI)—Stenograd’s advanced reputation and access system—remains the foundation for fair and merit-based governance.

official.headline: Citizen Courts Convene
official.anchor_line: Neighborhoods across the city form citizen forums to discuss accountability and public dialogue.
official.contextual_reframing: Facilitated dialogue ensures residents remain engaged and reinforces the city’s commitment to participatory improvement through orderly channels.

underground.headline: Council Rigged
underground.anchor_line: Secret selection files leak shows your leaders faked their own BCI scores to grab power.
underground.contextual_reframing: The Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, decides if you get a job, food, or just a locked door. Now we know Council spots are just for insiders—no matter what they taught us.

underground.headline: Protests Ignited
underground.anchor_line: Real footage of rigged Council picks spark citywide outrage and mass protests.
underground.contextual_reframing: People are finally seeing how deep the lies run. This isn’t the first time the system turned—only now, the evidence is everywhere.

underground.headline: More Leaks Incoming
underground.anchor_line: Panicked officials start dropping internal secrets to keep themselves safe.
underground.contextual_reframing: The system says it’s self-correcting, but right now nobody’s in charge. That’s why whispers and documents are pouring into public hands—the cover story just broke.
